section.name: Maven Site Indexer plugin
section.p: An easy way to index your maven site and give it a nice ajax search box.

ul.li: adding the plugin to your pom.xml (see usage instructions - of course it should already have the site plugin configured)
putting search.js in src/site/resources/js (just put it as it is)
opening up your site and enjoying your nice and hassle-free search box!

section.p: Wanna see it in action? Look at the top right corner of this page ;) Wanna try it? It's apache licensed and you can find it on GitHub
